DataElement.preferredName: Cutaneous T-cell Lymphoma Global Response Score Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response category that describes the overall disease status based on staging and classification criteria for cutaneous T-cell lymphoma (CTCL).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Cutaneous T-Cell Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma Global Response Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A T-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma arising from the skin. Representative examples include mycosis fungoides and primary cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma._A scoring system for assessing overall response to treatment in skin, lymph nodes, blood, and viscera.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A T-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma arising from the skin. Representative examples include mycosis fungoides and primary cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma.

Concepts.definition: A T-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma arising from the skin. Representative examples include mycosis fungoides and primary cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma.

Property.preferredDefinition: A scoring system for assessing overall response to treatment in skin, lymph nodes, blood, and viscera.

Concepts.definition: A scoring system for assessing overall response to treatment in skin, lymph nodes, blood, and viscera.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0370865: 19C0076 qns curation request. 4.17.19 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Recurrence of disease in prior complete response or relapse in any skin, nodes, blood, or viscera category.

Concepts.definition: Recurrence of disease in prior complete response or relapse in any skin, nodes, blood, or viscera category.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Progressive disease in any skin, nodes, blood, or viscera category.

Concepts.definition: Progressive disease in any skin, nodes, blood, or viscera category.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Failure to attain complete response, partial response, or progressive disease representative of all disease.  Partial response in skin and no nodes, blood and viscera category has a progressive disease and if any category involved at baseline, no complete or partial response in any.

Concepts.definition: Failure to attain complete response, partial response, or progressive disease representative of all disease.  Partial response in skin and no nodes, blood and viscera category has a progressive disease and if any category involved at baseline, no complete or partial response in any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Regression of measurable disease with complete response in skin and nodes, blood and viscera categories not having complete response or noninvolvement and where no category has progressive disease. Partial response is also assigned when there is partial response in skin and no nodes, blood and viscera category has a progressive disease and if any category involved at baseline at least one has a complete or partial response.

Concepts.definition: Regression of measurable disease with complete response in skin and nodes, blood and viscera categories not having complete response or noninvolvement and where no category has progressive disease. Partial response is also assigned when there is partial response in skin and no nodes, blood and viscera category has a progressive disease and if any category involved at baseline at least one has a complete or partial response.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Complete disappearance of all clinical evidence of disease with skin, nodes, blood and viscera categories having complete response or noninvolvement.

Concepts.definition: Complete disappearance of all clinical evidence of disease with skin, nodes, blood and viscera categories having complete response or noninvolvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A scoring system for assessing overall response to treatment in skin, lymph nodes, blood, and viscera.:A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

Concepts.definition: A scoring system for assessing overall response to treatment in skin, lymph nodes, blood, and viscera.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0370865: 19C0076 qns curation request 4.17.19 mc
